title: Untamed
description: This edition cancelled by the publisher.The so-called vampire queen is now ashes in the ground. But the elusive Council, composed of the vampire elders, remains, harboring secrets of its own—secrets that may be even more dangerous than the queen’s. River Gabriel, along with his cousin Dante, is determined to root out the mystery and bring down the council for good.  The only thing in his way? Lucy Cyrus, a feisty wolf shifter he’s fallen hard for. Lucy is happy to help River with his plans, but their feral libidos tend to get in the way much of the time, leading to an untamed passion that puts both their lives at risk.  Blood Bond Saga series reading order:  1. Unchained: Blood Bond: Parts 1, 2 & 3 2. Unhinged: Blood Bond: Parts 4, 5 & 6 3. Undaunted: Blood Bond: Parts 7, 8 & 9 4. Unmasked: Blood Bond: Parts 10, 11 & 12 5. Undefeated: Blood Bond: Parts 13, 14 & 15 6. Untamed: Blood Bond: Parts 16, 17 & 18
author: Helen Hardt
